scripts.build:docs: npm run build && rm -rf docs && mkdir -p docs && cp -R build/* docs/ && touch docs/.nojekyll
scripts.deploy:docs: npm run build:docs && git add docs package.json && git commit -m "deploy: update docs for GitHub Pages" && git push
scripts.deploy:nft: cp build/index.html build/404.html && mkdir -p build/docs && echo '<!doctype html><html><head><meta http-equiv="refresh" content="0; url=../"></head><body></body></html>' > build/docs/index.html && gh-pages -d build -r https://github.com/gibcou/nft-project-.git -b gh-pages
